title: Reasons to Be Cheerful (Ep. 417 Rebroadcast)
description: Humans have a built-in “negativity bias,” which means we give bad news much more power than good. Would the Covid-19 crisis be an opportune time to reverse this tendency?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
